name: Co Tuong Viet Nam - Co Vuong
name_original: Co Tuong Viet Nam - Co Vuong
description:
Co Vuong – Co Tuong, Co Up is an app for those who love Chinese chess online, totally free download.
More features:
- Automatically create accounts or directly link your Facebook.
- Allow you to invite your friends via Facebook.
- The qualified rating system by ELO.
- User-friendly interface, great moving effect, perfect music that feels like playing face-to-face.
- Chat with your opponent in the live battle.
- Auto update leaderboard.
Download Co Vuong for free! Play now and send us feedback for improving this game.
